website_summaries.verdict: Black shaper with an open breast bodysuit with shoulder straps, bottom choice of panty or thong.
pros: Adjustable straps for easing pressure from shoulders while pushing breasts up for flattering look
360 degrees of firm control to trim waist and tummy, and lift butt
Useful for everyday, postpartum, post C-section, post-liposuction, or under formal wear
cons: This shaper is popular among buyers, with very few complaints
Small number had issues with fit

customer_reviews.title: Do not go down a size if you have hips and butt 🙂
customer_reviews.text: The thong is a little uncomfortable if you were it for a day but for the most part it was great. If you have hips, butt and a somewhat smaller waste get the size that will allow you to get it over your hip/butt area. I ordered a large then a extra large because it was a situation getting it over the hip/butt area. Love my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole solomon

customer_reviews.title: Gives me razor burn, otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving this a 4 star Instead of a 5 star is because I cannot wear this due to it rubbing in between thighs. I shave down there and it causes me to get razor burn really bad. Overall though if I didn’t have such sensitive skin this would be a great slim shaper it even pushes up my breasts and looks great under clothing. I just wish maybe I should’ve gotten a bigger size. Due to other reviews I bought a small. Mind you I am 140lbs @ 5’3 other reviewers seemed to say this size was good for them at that weight I suggest going to what your true size is instead of one smaller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ringleka

customer_reviews.title: Seams are awkward
customer_reviews.text: I wear a L/XL, I’m 5’ and 145lbs. Size 11-12 jeans. I ordered a Large. Fit veeeeery snug in the hips, I should’ve ordered true to my size. Item must be made for individuals with longer torsos: I had fabric bunching at my underbust, and in the small of my back (even after adjusting shoulder straps) and there is a seam where the torso cincher stops and the underwear starts, that cuts into your lower belly and makes it look puckered under tight dresses. Plus the seam is very tight, so there is a noticeable indentation on the sides of the hips. Not attractive. I will be returning this week.
customer_reviews.author: OverWatch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice. MATERIAL IS GREAT QUALITY..At this price didn't expect the quality to be this awesome...
customer_reviews.author: BROWNGIRL67

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the size chart. It fits great! The all day fitted thong is a little uncomfortable... but the slimming action it does for my belly is amazing. I have the belly "pouch" and it completely pulls it right in. It fits great under my clothes. I have a long torso, so it stops about 2.5 inches under my bra in the front, but is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: So happy with it !! I'm a sizes s/m but I decided to get a small , why because I wanted to make my waist smaller and that's what it did , not only that ! Helped my booty pop out and it wa so comfortable to wear unlike other ones I had that after a hr u just want to take them off , my first day wearing it and I had it for more than 8 hrs . Love it I recomennd this to anyone looking for a comfortable and easy way to waist train or just for regular wear ! Will make your figure look super sexy
customer_reviews.author: Meleina

customer_reviews.title: I love how my body looks with this waist trainer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought ( L) because I weight 170 it was it was a bit too tight. So now I’m waiting for a XL, cause I just like how I look in it.
customer_reviews.author: conkon

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is ....
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sad but it is what it is. I ordered a L, XL ,XXL,XXXL, XXXXL this is the most uncomfortable control/weight loss contraption I have ever TRIED to wear. Ok, my details..I'm 6'1 180lbs I wear a size 12/14 I THOUGHT my hips weren't THAT big but this soul-sucking disappointment told me otherwise. I could barely get the 4XL up past my thighs! Ladies I promise you, you'll loose the weight just trying to put this on! I returned all my orders ....I love my body, long legs and all...so I'm not going to torture it with this thing. Be warned, unless you're a very slim, short, no curves woman..you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product!! Runs Big, order a size down!
customer_reviews.text: This seller is amazing! The Customer service exceeded my expectations and the seller went above and beyond to get it right. Seller is prompt, professional and solution based. According to the size chart, I measured a medium. I ordered the medium and unfortunately, it was just too big! I had extra material in the back that caused bunching even when the adjustable straps where at their smallest setting. I contacted the seller and they are sending me a small! I cannot wait to receive it. You cannot beat the quality for the price. Besides running a size too big, this product is absolutely excellent! I highly recommend this product, just order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: The product is really high quality, and seems like it would be very effective as a shaper, BUT-- the sizing, in my experience, is a complete joke. I originally ordered an XL, but it fit pretty much like a swimsuit, not pulling me in anywhere. I sent it back and got a L, and I can't get that past my upper thighs. The difference between the two was ridiculous. (There are two size charts on this listing, and they are wildly different from each other.)
customer_reviews.author: suzy888

customer_reviews.title: Great for belly tighening and fat loss
customer_reviews.text: I am very slim but suddenly developed fat above my belt line but none other and also around my back. I have been wearing these night and day and they are very comfortable and don't show under clothing. They are made out of wet suit type material. I have already noticed I have lost an inch. Hope the fat decides to go to my bootie or bust lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run big.
customer_reviews.text: From the previous comment I gathered that these run big so I ordered smaller than what I was original going to go with. It's perfect. Fits great. Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: copperhead18324

customer_reviews.title: Offer free products for 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. They offer you a free product for a 5star review. Received today, sending back today.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: I love the softness of
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of, the price was right, I love the thong, I hate big underwear. it toughing my my stomach really good, no one can tell tam wearing trainer, it does not feels like it, and give great coverage. I am losing weight fast soon don't loose skin, I already place second order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any variation in sizes
customer_reviews.text: I very comfortably wear a size 18 in pants. According to the sizing chart I wear a 2x so that is what i ordered. It was way too small! But I had read in the reviews that if you are bigger on your lower body than your upper you might need to size up. I wanted this to be something I could wear everyday. So I ordered a 4x. Surely that would fit! Nope! It fit very much like the 2x. They terribly at my hips causing an unusual bulge. Then both sort of gaped in the back. Not flattering at all. Sent them both back and I give up! Guess I will stick with spanx.
customer_reviews.author: bccarlis

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: You should totally go by their size scale to get the right size, however if you want a little more snatchage, you may be able to go down a size... otherwise great product. Im 5'8, 200lbs + mommy gut, got a bit of a booty so needed the thong version as to not make it look flat like other shapewear and ordered the XL. Tummy and rolls were sucked in. I do wish the fabric on the back was a little softer so it would lay better but it's no big deal. I may end up wearing this all the time (until I lose 20lbs lol)
customer_reviews.author: L. G

customer_reviews.title: Probably the worst shaper I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many shapers and own many shapers. This shaper by far has been the worst one I've purchased. I'm 5'0" and it felt like it was too long. The straps were unable to adjust short enough for me. It was very uncomfortable. It's also very stiff. When I where a shaper, I want it to be seamless and you could totally tell there was something under my clothing. I wouldn't recommend this item to short or petite women, it's just not made for our body type.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepypup

customer_reviews.title: Good product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have approx 35" waiste so I ordered the large. It fit but was a bit tight in areas, mostly the chest. It does make my figure more hour glass shaped which is what I have always wanted. I am DDD and just had a baby 2 months ago so have a little extra around the waiste I plan on loosing. I emailed them explaining I was happy with the product just didn't fit 100% to my liking. They quickly responded and are sending out another one in XL for FREE and are not requesting the large back. I am more than satisfied with how it was handled. Will be buying more products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ian honsowitz

customer_reviews.title: Well made but runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this a few times now. I normally wear a size xl but ordered a 2x. The fit was very tight. I understand that they're supposed to be tight but I do like to breathe. I ordered 1 size up but would order 2 sizes up next time. *Edit* I got the 3x and it fits perfectly! I have a curvy butt and hips so going up 2 sizes was a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no
customer_reviews.text: Ok this sucker was awful!!! I gave it 2 * only in case a doll wants to wear it. It was SO short and I ordered according to previous reviews-/- after I finally got it on, my belly was squeezed up and over the top. It was gross. I’m not huge - 4 kids and belly fat for sure but come on!!! 5’4” 145 lbs and a medium was NOT happening!! Good luck and size WAY up!
customer_reviews.author: M Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not a Compression Garment
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as advertised. Garment is NOT compression material. It is made of neoprene and offers zero compression. It was too large and bunched up both in the front and back. I do not recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled sizing. Ordered 3x got a L labeled a 3x
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3x, per the sizing chart it should fit me. I got it, couldn't wait to try it on and was sad to find that while the tag did say 3x, the one I got was not a 3x. I double checked my measurements, and yep! I should fit a 3x. I then checked the body shape measurements and it seems this was mislabeled as its actually the size of a large. Very disappointed, the reviews were glowing. I'm contemplating trying to order another after I return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elbaioumy

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get passed your hips and butt
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the hardest thing to get in to. It took me 10 swollen fingers and a busted hip to get this thing over my a*** and hips. And it’s the size I needed for my waist. I have no idea how I am taking it off or if I’ll ever put it back on once I do. It feels wonderful once I get it on though. Hopefully it will work. Then the struggle will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McKnight

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a gym workout getting it on
customer_reviews.text: O M G it is a workout trying to get this bugger on. If you’ve got somewhere to go and you don’t get dressed until 20 minutes before you leave, put this on before you do your hair and make up bc you’re going to be late. It fits really nice once you’ve burned 50 calories bouncing around your bedroom and you can’t even really feel like you’ve got it on, but man! getting it on is a chore
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL and this item fit perfectly. I am 5'3" and 155 lbs with a 36D chest, size 10 in jeans. Item seemed like it would be too small, but there it stretches well over the hips and thighs for a perfect fit in the body. I like how you can wear your own bra so you don't have to worry about odd coverage in the cleavage area. Well worth the money. I will be wearing this tonight under a fitted dress for a holiday party!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine N.

customer_reviews.title: Big pile of nope
customer_reviews.text: So based on reviews and sizing chart, I ordered a 2X, I am 5ft5 220 lbs generally were a 16 to 18 as sizing does very by brand. I got this today tried it on and I did but it was a struggle and did not have the desired effect. So it was cheap and I tried it on so I feel like returning is out. It will go in a drawer and if I lose 20lbs I may be able to wear it
customer_reviews.author: kerry norton

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, but nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This material looks great! It’s the size, however, that was sooooo messed up. I’m a size 16/18 & 42C and I know that when ordering things like this to ALWAYS SIZE UP. I did. I sized up to 4x and it was still not going to budge over my thighs and when I tried putting it on over my head, my boobs were too big and couldn’t get it on. Needless to say this is not made for plus size people, kind of blows my mind considering we are probably their biggest demographic..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for petite
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I'm 5'1" 140# ordered a medium. This was too tall in the torso, and shoulder strap. The compression just squished it into rolls. The seam at the hip gives the worst muffin top.
customer_reviews.author: K. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Plus size review *big belly review*
customer_reviews.text: Great product My hips are 50-52 *mostly stomach* and it took me down about 2 inches which is great... has enough give for you to sit like a normal person and adjust yourself if you get the size you should... I was gonna get a size down but didnt... good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Redd V.

customer_reviews.title: Long torso recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well made. Im 160lbs and 5'5 inch. I got a Large. It was a bit big as far ans being too long but it fit nice and snug. So im not sure how to rate it. It was big around the arms and chest a d a tad long as far as overall length but the smugness on the abdominal area was great!
customer_reviews.author: BlbPhx

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shapeware!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at purchasing comfortable yet slimming shapewear. After reading reviews I purchased this item and am very pleased. It is not difficult to put on and it does not feel so confining that you cannot move easily. It also does not roll at the stomach like many of the over the waist shapeware does.
customer_reviews.author: H. G. Pence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..smooth.slimming
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaper. I just got it and literally ran home to try it on. You honesty get quality. I won’t lie. I was skeptical about the price as I’ve ordered waist trainers that cost $$$. Well, I’m going to need to order a couple. This thing is amazing. It keeps everything nice and tight and I can actually breathe in it lol. Smooth, no show, which means I can wear underneath just about anything and no one will no. I am so satisfied with this product...
customer_reviews.author: dannie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pregnant bellies
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with my product I got it in a size xs as a matter of fact I used it during my whole pregnancy I needed something to hold up my very pregnant belly I feel like it’s probably perfect as a maturity garment for that reason. I tried to use it after I delivered my baby but I didn’t really get any support like I wanted from it. I gave it 5 stars because it is good quality for the price of others and I would only recommend for pregnant women it wasn’t uncomfortable or felt like i couldn’t breathe it was perfect maybe I just stretched it out after I had my baby
customer_reviews.author: Christine Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great with a little modification
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - 1 HUGE downfall, the hook and eye is so sturdy that the reinforced crotch literally rubs you till you bleed. If they redesign it to only 2 hooks so it is narrower it would be 5 stars but I had to cut the trim on the sides of the hooks and put mole skin so it would stop rubbing so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Carolin

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong quality & price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased any shapeware prior to this so I was a little nervous but once I tried this Junlan Waist Trainer Body Shaper I loved it. The material holds you in well but is not uncomfortable. I particularly like the bodysuit because my waist is large and the straps keep it from slipping down as well as enhance my chest. All in all it holds me in great and gives the smooth appearance I was looking for. Plus, for this price my expectations were fairly average but I was more then satisfied. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for high quality, comfort and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S.

customer_reviews.title: Quickly received, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very sheer but then it doesn't look it in the photo so I wasn't surprised. I wear a size 18 and ordered a 2X. I might have been able to go a size smaller but I'm pretty happy with this size especially because I have bigger hips.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Not at all comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the positive reviews I was very excited for this. Disappointed to report that it was hard to get on and very uncomfortable. I've never had shapewear before but this was an absolute struggle to get on And then even with the straps loosened all the way the straps dug into my shoulders and had me dying to take it off. On the plus size. I noticed a diffrence with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well made product. I ordered small. I am 5'3" 118 pounds 34D. 36-30-36 with extra weight in the tummy and muffin tops. Shaper smoothed everything but wasn't tight enough to shrink measurements. I like that it stays up but if you have even a tank top strap the straps will show because the straps sit just outside of your regular bra straps. I needed an XS but will still keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy with it
customer_reviews.text: it took a really long time to get here! but I do like it a lot .. very comfortable in comparison to others I bought .also, others I bought are noticeable under clothing this one isn't so much .tad bit bigger than I expected , the straps on arms don't tighten very much , I would of preferred them tighter but the rest fits good
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Slimming
customer_reviews.text: So I was so excited to try my shape wear when I got it. I knew it would be snug but I think it fit perfectly. It really smooths out any rolls and makes me feel good confidence wise. Also my pants slide over the shape wear perfectly. I didn’t have that tummy roll when I sat down. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to feel smooth and confident !
customer_reviews.author: Corissa

customer_reviews.title: If you’re hip heavy go to XL or 2X
customer_reviews.text: I received it sooner than expected. I’m in between sizes as to I just had baby 7 months ago and I’m in between a 14/16. I ordered a large and it was way too small but that could be because I have big thighs. I contacted customer service and got back to me right away so I can exchange to a bigger size. I say if you have big things like me please go with the XL.
customer_reviews.author: reddgirl1209

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material, does what it says it does, very satisfied ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This product is almost perfect. It works great at shaping up my waist all of my dresses look at fit better. My only issue is it seems a little short, but I have a long torso and high waistline so without having it personally fitted it literally couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.author: Wess bowers

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have had to return this product twice. It is nowhere near true to size. The first time, I ordered an XL which is my size in all other clothes. It was extremely small, I couldn’t get it up my legs or over my chest. Then I ordered a 3XL, two sizes up just to be safe. I couldn’t pull that one up my legs either. I managed to get it over my chest and stomach but the straps that hook at the bottom wouldn’t reach each other. I shouldn’t have to guess which size will fit me. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: hannah davidson

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: All of the reviews said to order a size down so I did. But I think I would have been better off with a 3x. Regardless, the item is well made, it holds my tummy in, and I like the adjustable straps a lot. Im on a weight loss journey so hopefully in a month or so this will be perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: This tight fitting body support was purchased with hopes it would give her both support during a night out dancing and control some of her tummy concerns. It worked excellent and although she usually fits into medium outfits, the large worked better to over her hips. A well made garment that worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, walk away. Runs extremely small!
customer_reviews.text: Product has no give at all. Largest size would not fit more than halfway up my thighs. I am a size 20 in American womens sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but size up.
customer_reviews.text: Great material, love the product, however I ordered a medium and I’m 5’6, 145 pounds and this almost killed me pulling it on and off. I wish I had gotten a large!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Phillips-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The seams are so ridiculous. I ended up with a worse shape than letting my saggy belly hang over. Theres this odd seam around the waist that just cuts you in two and goves the worst muffin. Would have been great if that dumb seam wasnt there. Its pointless too. Ruined my first date.
customer_reviews.author: Rozzlon

customer_reviews.title: Slim down for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this already. I just have an issue getting it over my thighs and hips! Other than that, it does it's job. I got a medium but I’m a small. I went up a size because of the reviews and others having the same issues of getting it over the thighs/hips area... This is my second one now and I’m even more pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Coco Puffs

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Got this the other day and was pleasantly surprised how well made this item is for the price. I order a small and it fits perfect. I am 5’8 145lbs. I have a longer torso. I wasn’t sure about the thong, but after wearing it for a little bit, it becomes more comfortable.I think you could size down for a tighter fit. I would recommend for daily use. I will be buying more than one!
customer_reviews.author: Dnmfrmn

customer_reviews.title: I really like this body shaper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this body shaper. The material is nice and thick and provides good tummy control. The style is also good providing seamless coverage on your back since it goes all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase two more.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit!! I wear this under my workout clothes. I’m a 11/12.. 38D. Very comfortable & slimming. I must say, the thong and seat area is more comfortable than I expected. You can nit tell it’s under your clothes. Maybe I’ll wear it under a nice tight dress.
customer_reviews.author: LuvlyRNurse

customer_reviews.title: Good intentions
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and weigh 190 pounds, hourglass shaped and I just needed some help with the tummy like some moms do. It was way too big and would not work. Its well made and had good intentions. The rear end part is cut out so it doesnt squish your bottom but theres potential for a wedgie for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 but its a tad long so it bunches a bit. I'm going to shorten the straps and I think it'll make it perfect. It's probably just my body type. I'm 5'4 150 and I got the M.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product was very satisfactory. It arrived in time and in good condition. I get lots of compliments when I'm wearing it. Though it is not the most comfortable it is well made and shapes my waist nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Yasss, it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute 10/10 purchase. I got a medium, which I’ll admit is a struggle to fit over my *larger* assets, but after a bit of unattractive shimmying and coaxing over my hips, it fits like a glove. Very comfortable, I barely feel it, helps with posture and I don’t have to feel preoccupied with making sure I’m sucking in my gut 24/7. This will be a godsend while me and my husband are walking around a convention in skin tight costumes. I’ve already recommended it to my friend, and I will continue recommending it. Very good purchase, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Norris

customer_reviews.title: It fit, but really didn't change much
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was fine, it "fit" but I didn't find that it did much shaping. There was a little bit of smoothing in the stomach area, but overall you could tell I was wearing something underneath my clothes, so not very subtle there, and it was a bit short, so I found myself slouching a bit to be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: India DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like picture. It’s kind of hard to get on ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly.Exactly like picture. It’s kind of hard to get on because there’s not that much stretch but once on I loved it. The only thing I don’t love is it’s a thong bottom which became uncomfortable after awhile but that more of a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Too Small. Sizing Off.
customer_reviews.text: I went up a size after reading reviews that it was too small. When I tried it on for the first time I could not even get it on over my legs. Definitely did not correlate with the sizing listed here. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: bwicker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Keeps you snatched!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect!!!! The packaging was pretty simple. The waist trainer is literally perfect! It keeps you snatched and tucked.. secures the tummy. Definitely a life saver when you’re bloated or just a little chubby. Definitely purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very slimming
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, slimmed me out for a very form fitting dress. Only thing that bothered me were the straps, they were a tad uncomfortable. But this thing wasn't really made for comfort. It did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this trainer sucks your entire life in! I love it! Only downfall is the underwear part is like a thong and can be uncomfortable so you may have to wear a thong or no underwear. It rides. Other than that it sucked in everything that needed to be sucked in including back fat. Beauty is pain
customer_reviews.author: kiana brown

customer_reviews.title: Plus size run
customer_reviews.text: 2x It's HELL trying to put this on. Once on its breathtaking literally if your bigger than 16w as previously stated. It slimmed me yes but I'd be taking short breaths...lol i ordered a 3X it was still hard to get on but then it didn't hold my middle line the 2x. Soooo needless to say I sent both back😞
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this so much. I've been wearing shapewear since I gained weight in my late 20's, and this is the best one I've tried so far. I ordered true to size, and it fits snugly without being too constricting. It works better than any other shapewear I've tried. It smooths out all your lumps and humps. Where does the belly fat go? I don't care, as long as it's not hanging out over the top of my jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Detisch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits great once you squeeze it on and it’s comfortable. I think I will go with a size smaller even to not get the extra back fabric bulges as everyone talks about . I’m 5’5” weigh 158lbs
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Material too thick
customer_reviews.text: It’s loterally like wearing those sweat bands that you use for the gym. It’s not good if you plan on wearing a thin material on top because the waist area is so think that when it bunches up it will show through that you are wearing. It also doesn’t give you a hourglass becuase it’s so think it just squares you more. I prefer a more fabric like and not this one
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nope! try again
customer_reviews.text: runs a bit small and its not one cohesive piece. it's two different pieces sewn together so it's only "slimming" around the mid section not throughout the whole suit there is no lower abdominal support at all. will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of smoothing everything out I went down to a med so I could have a tighter fit I usually wear xl. I only wish it would push my stomach in a little better but either way I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: The material seems good but Wow do they run small will be returning the large I don’t want a new one ether bc I usually fit in medium clothing and there was absolutely no way this was going to fit if you order this product and you wear US sizes go like 3 sizes up not worth my time to figure out what size will fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs super small
customer_reviews.text: But even close to wearable. Waaaaay too small. I even bought a size up. Maybe the label is wrong but I couldn’t wear it and breath at same time. I choose breathing. I gave 3 stars because return was easy. That’s always nice when something is too small. Right?!?
customer_reviews.author: Iluvprime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I rated it a 5 for the fit and control. This is amazing. Wish it came in a nude color as well. Can not see it under clothing including tight pants. Breathable fabric is great for every season. Snaps at the crotch really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product runs way small but it seems like it's made out of really good material and its really well-made so I sent this one back but I reordered it in the two sizes larger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a hook to secure the snaps in the middle. From my experience the snaps sometimes come apart at the top. And the zipper makes it less visible that under clothes. My only complaint is that the material is thinner than I was expecting. I used during postpartum
customer_reviews.author: TruthBtold

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and great price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ones I have ever bought. Quality is great, true to fit and it gives that smoothness you look for when you buy shapewear.
customer_reviews.author: Saralee Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a hassle to put on but I mean what shape wear isn't? It was alright for the price but it doesn't really smooth out the back as much as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as my medical compression garment
customer_reviews.text: This garment allows me to have a variation of garments that I can wear during my healing time from my procedure. My medical grade compression garment does not allow me to wear jeans where this garment gives me this option. It fits a little tight but it still gives me the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Raichelle Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.. wouldn’t re-purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The shape is kind of odd. The top portion is just a tad too big width wise for the rest. I would like it to be just a little tighter around the bust areas and smaller straps. I bought a size S I’m 5’5 128lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and not like a normal compression garment. Doesn’t stretch much so very hard to put on. For those with hips and small wait - difficult to put on and scrunches lower back creating seams and ripples/waves.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit...slimming in the tummy and back, but no bulging in the thigh areas. It’s a little difficult to put on so make sure you use the size guide so you don’t order too small. I wish the straps would adjust to be a little shorter, but other than that this is exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Heath

customer_reviews.title: I was lied to
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Save your money. I consulted the size chart and the comments before ordering. I could not even get one leg in. There was absolutely no stretch either. 10/10 would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Collier

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it past my knees!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was waaaay off. I am a not terribly curvy size 14. Went by measurements. I think I may have been able to wear it on one thigh. Maybe the labeling was wrong, but there was no way I could even properly try it on. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Super compfy. Runs big. Helped with love handles not so much with the back chubbs. Over all its a good quality product. Im about 235lbs and got a 2xl .. and could of gotten away with a 1xl.
customer_reviews.author: Glorious1721

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and is soft. I took measurements before ordering, however am very disappointed that upon receipt, there was NO way that I could fit into it. It said it was the size I ordered, but is at least three sizes too small. I wear US 10-12 and ordered an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but for long torsos
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but the straps are too long...I may have to just cut them off and resew them. Also, the back despite fitting tight doesn't fit flat down, guess it could be due to the straps.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: It’s too long. Very cheap material. It does not shape you body but so ever. It hard to put on too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 1x. I brought this in a 4x. Couldn't get it above my knees. Sorry going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Body shaper
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for the thong portion of the body shaper but it does smooth out your body/torso so that you look uniform in your clothes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This Junlan Waist Trainer Body Shaper Bodysuit Women Corset Cincher felt amazing and I was surprised how it lifted my midline as well. I wore it under my scrubs at work and even though I wore it on the job it held my stomach in. I love the material it's very soft this is a plus in my book. I will be ordering another as I lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size chart
customer_reviews.text: Shape wear has potential to be great , but it is not true to size , chart is not accurate . I ordered a large and I could barely put on and remove. Shape wear could not go up leg/thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money  and keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I followed the measurements and even had my hubby measure to be sure. Ordered a 3xl i normally wear a xl/1x this was ridiculously small. Also it came in a plastic baggie and did not have a tag. Item appeared to be one someone returned or something. Even if it didnt look like it would fit my 5 yr old i would still return it as Im not sure it hasnt been tried on before
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and tight so it doesnt actually make you look bigger like some shapers. Thick fabric. 10 /10 would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just runs small
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but did not work for me. I ordered based off of the size chart but I still should have sized up one from there. I had to have assistance get this thing off! There may have been tears involved. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Best quality shaper I’ve come across
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few items similar online to support my abdomen post hernia surgery but nothing gave me the support I needed in this particular style. I did not want a full panty bottom, the thong style goes with more outfit choices. I am very happy with this purchase and even happier for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great price for nice item
customer_reviews.text: Love it .. I guess I wore it too much that it fell apart.. but I just bought 2 more since the price is right .. it’s worth the money .. I love the fact that I can wear it with pants also and gives your behind a nice plump look.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen T

customer_reviews.title: Size come smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: Hello :) I bought this waist trainer since I read good reviews about it and the size. I normally get a medium but for this one I got a large and it wouldn’t even go up my thighs and my thighs aren’t big at all. It took me a while to try them so I missed the window to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. My purpose in buying this is to ...
customer_reviews.text: The past reviews helped me a lot in deciding what size to get. I went 1 size down. Perfect fit. My purpose in buying this is to use as my torso compression for my chronic back pain and other issues. I altered the bottom/crotch part, so I don't have to hook back on restroom breaks. This body shaper never rolled up. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Made my dress look good
customer_reviews.text: Everything was held in the right place! the dress looked amazing could still dance ! The straps were a bit uncomfortable but manageable. After a few drinks it was hard to keep hooking and unhooking so i left it unhooked the rest of the night and it stayed in place it didnt rise up which was nice !
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer meza

customer_reviews.title: Appears return is too late
customer_reviews.text: Try this on as soon as you receive. It will be too small ad make sure you return timely or option to return is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Charelle Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and sucks it all in to give you that hourglass we all want to see
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. Do reccomend. Pay attention to sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2xl but I wish I could have gone 1 size down. I'm also a little annoyed because someone opened my package. So when I checked my mail it was already open. Oh well. I always wash every clothing piece before wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

product_meta.title: Waist Trainer Body Shaper Bodysuit Women Corset Cincher Shapewear Open Bra for Weight Loss
feature_bullets: Adjustable straps, adjust to the best length you fit, reduce the pressure on the shoulders.Look gorgeous with the best girdles for women and get the silhouette you always dreamed of.

These girdles shapewear are good for everyday use and as a postpartum girdle after pregnancy or C Section girdle. It Can be used too as a liposuction compression garment in the recovery process as a post surgery girdle. It also Fits perfect as bridal shapewear. It is perfect for prom dresses,evening gowns, wedding dresses,bridesmaids dresses,backless top and more keep the garment in place

A Full-Body Shaper in Strapless Firm control shapewear to slim your waist 360 degrees of firm control--trimming waist, tummy and lift butt.Suitable for post-partum or surgery Body smoother shapewear for dresses, 360 degrees of firm control--trimming waist, tummy and hips,breathable and comfortable design. Available in Panty or Thong seamless under clothes. Torso Shaping reduces Tummy

Perfect for createing an hourglass figure,comfortable,you can wear it for long time.Push up belt lifts up the breast,Highlights your breast,and slim your waist keep garment in good place.Creates an hourglass shaper

bodysuit shapewear body shaper slimmer is design to specially shape the midsection with targeted firm tummy control to emphasize your natural curves The compression built around midsection corrects posture and boosts fat burn while standing or sitting during work. Great shapewear to be worn after pregnancy, it offers all the support and compression your ab needs to get back in its original shape
